oai_dc:dc.dc:title: SURFACE/INTERNAL WAVES GENERATED BY AIR PRESSURE WAVES OVER SEABED TOPOGRAPHY
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kakinuma, Taro
Kosugi, Jungo
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Tsunamis were widely observed when the large eruption of Hunga Tonga-Hunga Ha`apai volcano occurred in January 2022 (e.g. Tanioka et al., 2022). In the present study, numerical simulations were generated using a nonlinear shallow-water model of velocity potentials to study the fundamental processes of surface/internal wave generation and amplification by air pressure waves.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 38 (2024): Proceedings of 38th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Rome, Italy, 2024; waves.105
